# App 42

App 42 is a product with features for Telegram

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Deleting a session
We recommend to remove active session after using App 42 to make sure that the service doesn't do something without your knowledge.

1. Open the settings tab
2. Open ¬´Devices¬ª or ¬´Active Sessions¬ª (dependent by device)
3. Find a session with ¬´app42¬ª
4. Click on session row
5. Click on ¬´Terminate session¬ª
6. Confirm your action

## üåè Translations
We use [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/kit-42) as a translation platform.
